title: [Question] is this true?? Should we wait for rr to get placed then ec?? I can't find any post which say this

comments.body:
Absolutely not

RR and EC PESU are the same college - PES University 

Please don't fall for such things on other subs
They said that ec students must wait for the completion of placement in rr campus then they can attend the placements....
nothing like this, pes has combined placements they donâ€™t declare which student is from which campus they donâ€™t even have this in their database so both the campuses get same opportunities
Who tf compares PES with SJCE dawg ðŸ¥€ðŸ¥€
In Mysore everyone does sadly ðŸ¥€ðŸ¥€
There's nothing like this lmao some of my friends have even been shortlisted for interviews (unfortunately they weren't selected)
Then y the kcet cutoff for both the campuses r different nd vary so much?
Ppl in other subs have built misconceptions about both campuses prolly considering KCET or JEE cutoffs at both.Dw about that.Both are centralized and cgpa based.
